subsection.name: Summary
subsection.p: This directive provides macros and functions to generate code specific to Spring Beans / Data implementation.
Using a function in a template can be done using <jpa.functionName(att1, ..., atti, ..., attn) /> syntax.
Using a macro in a template can be done using <@jpa.macroName att1 atti attn /> syntax.

td.p: Renders an entity dependency, i.e. a reference to its corresponding Spring Data repository

div.p: Renders an entity dependency, i.e. a reference to its corresponding Spring Data repository
